title: 无聊做的CB小作品
author: syz666
txt_content:
无聊的时候做的CB小作品。
使用步骤：
1.安装资源包
2.新建作弊世界，输入指令
3.Enjoy!!!

资源包：https://pan.lanzou.com/964596
指令：
Magic Obsidian:
give @p minecraft:command_block 1 0 {BlockEntityTag:{auto:1b,Command:"setblock ~ ~ ~ minecraft:mob_spawner 0 replace {SpawnData:{id:minecraft:armor_stand,ArmorItems:[{},{},{},{id:minecraft:leather_boots,Count:1,Damage:13,tag:{Unbreakable:1,display:{color:7324159}}}],HandItems:[{id:minecraft:leather_boots,Count:1,Damage:23,tag:{Unbreakable:1,display:{color:6225898}}},{}],Pose:{RightArm:[30f,0f,0f],LeftArm:[30f,0f,0f]}},RequiredPlayerRange:0,MaxNearbyEntities:0}"}}

Legendary Stone:
give @p minecraft:command_block 1 0 {BlockEntityTag:{auto:1b,Command:"setblock ~ ~ ~ minecraft:mob_spawner 0 replace {SpawnData:{id:minecraft:armor_stand,ArmorItems:[{},{},{},{id:minecraft:leather_boots,Count:1,Damage:14,tag:{Unbreakable:1,display:{color:10878930},ench:[{id:64}]}}],HandItems:[{id:minecraft:leather_boots,Count:1,Damage:22,tag:{Unbreakable:1,display:{color:7393279},ench:[{id:64}]}},{}],Pose:{RightArm:[30f,0f,0f],LeftArm:[30f,0f,0f]}},RequiredPlayerRange:0,MaxNearbyEntities:0}"}}

Magic Grass:
give @p minecraft:command_block 1 0 {BlockEntityTag:{auto:1b,Command:"setblock ~ ~ ~ minecraft:mob_spawner 0 replace {SpawnData:{id:minecraft:armor_stand,ArmorItems:[{},{},{},{id:minecraft:leather_boots,Count:1,Damage:12,tag:{Unbreakable:1,display:{color:4704511}}}],HandItems:[{id:minecraft:leather_boots,Count:1,Damage:16,tag:{Unbreakable:1,display:{color:7397119}}},{id:minecraft:leather_boots,Count:1,Damage:35,tag:{Unbreakable:1,display:{color:6225919}}}],Pose:{RightArm:[30f,0f,0f],LeftArm:[30f,0f,0f]}},RequiredPlayerRange:0,MaxNearbyEntities:0}"}}

Magic Oreblock:
give @p minecraft:command_block 1 0 {BlockEntityTag:{auto:1b,Command:"setblock ~ ~ ~ minecraft:mob_spawner 0 replace {SpawnData:{id:minecraft:armor_stand,ArmorItems:[{},{},{},{id:minecraft:leather_boots,Count:1,Damage:3,tag:{Unbreakable:1,display:{color:16724530}}}],HandItems:[{},{}],Pose:{RightArm:[30f,0f,0f],LeftArm:[30f,0f,0f]}},RequiredPlayerRange:0,MaxNearbyEntities:0}"}}

Magic Log:
give @p minecraft:command_block 1 0 {BlockEntityTag:{auto:1b,Command:"setblock ~ ~ ~ minecraft:mob_spawner 0 replace {SpawnData:{id:minecraft:armor_stand,ArmorItems:[{},{},{},{id:minecraft:leather_boots,Count:1,Damage:8,tag:{Unbreakable:1,display:{color:5046259}}}],HandItems:[{},{}],Pose:{RightArm:[30f,0f,0f],LeftArm:[30f,0f,0f]}},RequiredPlayerRange:0,MaxNearbyEntities:0}"}}

Legendary Block:
give @p minecraft:command_block 1 0 {BlockEntityTag:{auto:1b,Command:"setblock ~ ~ ~ minecraft:mob_spawner 0 replace {SpawnData:{id:minecraft:armor_stand,ArmorItems:[{},{},{},{id:minecraft:leather_boots,Count:1,Damage:10,tag:{Unbreakable:1,display:{color:5043199},ench:[{id:64}]}}],HandItems:[{id:minecraft:leather_boots,Count:1,Damage:21,tag:{Unbreakable:1,display:{color:2031405},ench:[{id:64}]}},{}],Pose:{RightArm:[30f,0f,0f],LeftArm:[30f,0f,0f]}},RequiredPlayerRange:0,MaxNearbyEntities:0}"}}


之前发矿工版被删了。。
但是又觉得在技巧版发太水了……
就这样好尴尬

replies.txt_content: 这是好像是我之前看到的那个利用耐久的小技巧owo

replies.author: 六月奈
replies.txt_content:
请简单介绍一下作品
如果可以的话最好附带实现原理
另外，请善用编辑功能

replies.author: Java_command
replies.txt_content:
https://codecrafted.net/blockdesigner

一看就想起来了……
你就不能做一个OOC让他生存也可以用吗[滑稽]
lanzou盘亮点。
